sources.snippet_or_excerpt: Crypto had a rough November. The pain is persisting into December — and that could signal trouble ahead for the stock market.
AI-powered sentiment signals give everyday traders the same edge institutions use. Delivered as clear, data-driven signals.
Bitcoin Cash (BCH) edges higher by 4% at press time on Friday, extending the 3.51% gains from Thursday on the back of reduced inflation in...
Crypto markets were already on edge heading into President Donald Trump's 9 PM EST primetime address to the nation from the White House.
More traders are turning to bots as the always-on crypto market demands faster execution than humans can deliver.

hypothesis_content.title: Friday Close - Monday Open Momentum Continuation with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: In NEUTRAL/BULL regimes, when Friday's (21:00 UTC close) 4h candle shows >0.8% price movement with volume >15% above 20-day average, and price remains within ±0.5% of Friday's close at Sunday 22:00 UTC, the Friday direction continues into Monday's session (00:00-12:00 UTC) with >67% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Strong Friday closes with high volume often represent institutional positioning or accumulation that carries through the weekend. The Sunday price stability condition filters out weekend noise. This captures institutional flows that resume Monday morning, particularly in neutral/bull regimes where risk appetite supports continuation.
entry_conditions: Friday 4h volume >115% of 20-day average for same period
Sunday 22:00 UTC price within ±0.5% of Friday 21:00 UTC close
Entry at Monday 00:00 UTC candle open in Friday's direction
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Success rate <58% OR more than 35% of trades hit stop-loss before take-profit. Strategy fails during BEAR/STRESS regimes where weekend sentiment shifts dominate.
